LanguageData.BorderlessFullscreenInstructions:
To run RimWorld in borderless fullscreen mode:

1) Open Steam
2) Go to the "Library" tab at the top
3) Find RimWorld on the list and right-click it
4) Choose "Properties..."
5) Add "-popupwindow" without quotes to "Launch options" in the "General" tab
6) Restart game
7) If done correctly, you won't see this window

Hint: Use Windows Key + Shift + Left/Right to move the window between your monitors.
